backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining data models, storage maps, compare helpers, site settings, and user/admin authorization via mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Report listing feature implementations, associated frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing short explanations of various frontend files and their purposes.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide describing prechecks, steps, troubleshooting, and validation for Version 24.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point including metadata, favicon, root div, and script to start the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the app router, page routes including admin guard routes, theme provider, and toaster setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity, clearing admin session and query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users without profiles to enter their name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with logo, quick links, contact info, and a caffeine.ai credit section.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps the app layout with navigation, footer, WhatsApp button, and handles actor connectivity warnings.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Displays the top navigation bar with logo, desktop and mobile menus, and login button.
frontend/src/components/whatsapp/WhatsAp: Creates a floating WhatsApp contact button using site settings for phone number and message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReady.ts: Provides hooks and utilities to wait for actor readiness with polling and timeout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Tracks and exposes reactive admin session unlock state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Contains admin auth logic, passkey verification, user profile queries, and backend admin authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider for managing login state, identity loading, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for products, enquiries, messages, site settings, and order submissions, including mutations and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables for light/dark modes, and base styling utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders the admin dashboard with tab-based navigation for managing products, enquiries, and settings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEnquiriesP: Wrapper page that renders the admin enquiries panel.
Fetches and displays enquiries in a table with confirm and reject actions and related dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminFeedbackPa: Fetches and displays customer feedback in a table with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayoutPage: Provides the admin layout, navigation, logout handling, and routing to product, enquiry, feedback, and message pages.
Handles admin passkey verification and redirects to the requested admin page after successful login.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMessagesPa: Fetches and displays contact form messages in a table with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Wrapper page that renders the admin products panel.
Admin interface for listing products and adding new ones with image upload and form validation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRouteGuard: Guards admin routes by checking session unlock status and redirecting to login if needed.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Admin panel for viewing and updating site-wide settings including contact info, WhatsApp config, and pricing table.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminTwoStepAcc: UI component that requires Internet Identity login and an admin passkey before granting access.
frontend/src/pages/AdvantagesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of HDPE pipe advantages with icons and descriptive text.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form that sends messages via backend hooks and displays company contact details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero, features, about, and navigation call‑to‑action sections.
frontend/src/pages/OrderEnquiryPage.tsx: Handles order and enquiry submissions with validation, file upload, price lookup, and backend integration.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays all products fetched from the backend with loading skeletons and product cards including availability and specifications.
Shows a static grid of HDPE pipe application cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/adminCredentials.ts: Stores and verifies the frontend-only admin passkey constant.
frontend/src/utils/adminReturnPath.ts: Manages storing and retrieving the admin return path in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/adminSession.ts: Controls admin unlock state in sessionStorage and notifies listeners of session changes.
frontend/src/utils/buildInfo.ts: Defines build metadata and provides a helper to log version and environment info.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL or session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts, colors, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state describing an app with a hard‑coded admin passkey, a regression blocking admin access, and feature requests to restore full admin rights.
